files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# the project itself is not installable, so we'll make sure nothing from composer gets into the repo
vendor
composer.lock

files.name: .travis.yml
files.content:
language: php

php: 
  - 5.3
  - 5.4

before_script:
  - curl -s http://getcomposer.org/installer | php
  - php composer.phar install --dev

script: phpunit

files.name: CHANGELOG.md
files.content:
Ardent's Changelog
==================

Please, look at the [project's release][1] page :)

[1]:https://github.com/laravelbook/ardent/releases

files.name: README.md
composer.json
phpunit.xml
files.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phpunit backupGlobals="false"
         backupStaticAttributes="false"
         bootstrap="vendor/autoload.php"
         colors="true"
         convertErrorsToExceptions="true"
         convertNoticesToExceptions="true"
         convertWarningsToExceptions="true"
         processIsolation="false"
         stopOnFailure="false"
         syntaxCheck="false"
>
    <testsuites>
        <testsuite name="Package Test Suite">
            <directory>./tests/</directory>
        </testsuite>
    </testsuites>
</phpunit>
